title: Ben Wallace – 2020 Comments on Military Accommodation
author: admin
summary: The text of the comments made by Ben Wallace, the Secretary of State for Defence, on 17 July 2020.
content:
Our Armed Forces work incredibly hard to keep our nation safe, and so it is only right that they have a place they feel proud to call home.
